Raymond Edward Lemek (June 28, 1934 na September 17, na afọ 2005) bụ onye America na-agbachitere bọọlụ na National Football League maka Washington Redskins na Pittsburgh Steelers
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji na Mahadum Notre Dame ebe ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu 1955
Ndị Washington Redskins dere ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike na agba nke iri na itoolu, nke iri nke 1956 NFL Draft
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Redskins na afọ 1956 n'afọ 1961, ahọpụtara ya maka Pro Bowl n'afọ 1961 wee soro Pittsburgh Steelers gbaa bọọlụ na afọ 1962
E liri ya na Cedar Grove Cemetery na Notre Dame, Indiana.Àtụ:Redskins1956DraftPicks
